data.quote: Face your your fear.  Accept your war.  It is what it is.
data.author: Zakk Wylde

data.quote: Heavy Metal is the most conservative of all loud music. Let's face it, not even a gym teacher could get as many people to dress alike.
data.author: Jello Biafra

data.quote: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
data.author: Chesty Puller

data.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t, you’re right.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
data.author: Jack Dempsey

data.quote: Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency. Consistent hard work gains success. Greatness will come.
data.author: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson

data.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
data.author: Eric Nightingale

data.quote: Work hard in silence. Let success be your noise.
data.author: Frank Ocean

data.quote: Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
data.author: Jerry Dunn

data.quote: Look at those who have talked about you and doubted you. They are your inspirational reason to succeed.
data.author: Jon Jones

data.quote: The only limitations are the ones we put on ourselves and I just don't believe in limiting myself.
data.author: Jon Jones

data.quote: Fear is just like fire, it can be helpful if you know how to use it. If not, you’ll get burned.
data.author: Mike Tyson

data.quote: Man, I got to say I love my haters because they challenge myself... it challenges me. It challenges me to be better. It challenges me to show who I am and that I deserve to be who I am.
data.author: Cris Cyborg

data.quote: Genius is insanity right up until it works.
data.author: Forrest Griffin

data.quote: A champion is defined by the adversity he overcomes
data.author: Anderson Silva

data.quote: Nothing good ever comes from worrying or sitting there feeling sorry for yourself... Keep positive and keep pushing on and things will turn good.
data.author: Conor McGregor

data.quote: Excellence is not a skill, excellence is an attitude.
data.author: Conor McGregor

data.quote: The danger is not to set your goal too high and fail to reach it. It’s to set your goal too low and reach it
data.author: Georges St-Pierre

data.quote: Whatever your walk in life is, you pick what you want to be, then go ahead and be the best one.
data.author: CM Punk
